TABLE.NAME: attendancebot
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the attendancebot activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Si el plugin esta prendido (true) o apagado(false)

FIELD.NAME: late_tolerance
FIELD.COMMENT: Tolerancia (en minutos) para saber si alguien esta tarde

FIELD.NAME: recolection_platform
FIELD.COMMENT: Plataforma en el que se va a recolectar la informacion

FIELD.NAME: camera
FIELD.COMMENT: Detección de cámara para considerar presente al alumno

FIELD.NAME: saving_platform
FIELD.COMMENT: Plataforma en donde se va a pasar la asistencia

FIELD.NAME: clases_finish_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp de la finalizacion de clases

FIELD.NAME: clases_start_time
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp del tiempo (horas y minutos desde el comienzo del dia) del comienzo del meeting

FIELD.NAME: clases_finish_time
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp del tiempo (horas y minutos desde el comienzo del dia) del final del meeting

FIELD.NAME: backuprecordings
FIELD.COMMENT: Si se deben respaldar recordings de Zoom
